code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BugForm=_ref=>{let{addBug}=_ref;const[title,setTitle]=useState('');const[description,setDescription]=useState('');const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(!title.trim())return;addBug({title:title.trim(),description:description.trim(),resolved:false,id:Date.now()});setTitle('');setDescription('');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"bug-form",onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Bug title",value:title,onChange:e=>setTitle(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{placeholder:"Bug description",value:description,onChange:e=>setDescription(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Add Bug"})]});};export default BugForm;
